import React from 'react'; import { EmailComponent, ComponentType } from '../../types'; import { ColorPicker } from './ColorPicker'; interface ComponentInspectorProps { selectedComponent: EmailComponent; updateComponent: (id: string, updates: Partial) => void; deleteComponent: (id: string) => void; duplicateComponent: (id: string) => void; } export const ComponentInspector: React.FC = ({ selectedComponent, updateComponent, deleteComponent, duplicateComponent }) => { const [showDeleteConfirm, setShowDeleteConfirm] = React.useState(false); const [footerPanels, setFooterPanels] = React.useState({ header: true, address: true, social: true, unsubscribe: true }); const handlePropertyChange = (key: string, value: any) => { console.log('Property change:', { key, value, componentId: selectedComponent.id }); updateComponent(selectedComponent.id, { props: { ...selectedComponent.props, [key]: value, }, }); }; const handleDelete = () => { setShowDeleteConfirm(true); }; const confirmDelete = () => { deleteComponent(selectedComponent.id); setShowDeleteConfirm(false); }; const cancelDelete = () => { setShowDeleteConfirm(false); }; const handleDuplicate = () => { duplicateComponent(selectedComponent.id); }; const renderPropertyEditor = () => { switch (selectedComponent.type) { case 'header': return (
{/* 1. Title */}
handlePropertyChange('title', e.target.value)} className={`input-field pr-8 ${selectedComponent.props.title === '' ? 'border-orange-300 focus:ring-orange-500' : ''}`} placeholder="Company Name" />
{/* 2. Subtitle */}
handlePropertyChange('subtitle', e.target.value)} className={`input-field pr-8 ${selectedComponent.props.subtitle === '' ? 'border-orange-300 focus:ring-orange-500' : ''}`} />
{/* 3. Colors in Grid */}
handlePropertyChange('backgroundColor', color)} label="Background Color" placeholder="Select background color" />
handlePropertyChange('textColor', color)} label="Text Color" placeholder="Select text color" />
{/* 4. Logo URL */}
handlePropertyChange('logo', e.target.value)} className="input-field" placeholder="https://example.com/logo.png" />
{/* 5. Logo Dimensions in Grid */}
handlePropertyChange('logoWidth', e.target.value)} className="input-field pr-8" placeholder="200px, 100%, auto" />
handlePropertyChange('logoHeight', e.target.value)} className="input-field pr-8" placeholder="60px, 80px, auto" />
); case 'text': return (
